name: shepherd-next
description: ingested_at based indexer, amongst other things

scripts.init: lockfiles=$(find . -name 'package-lock.json' -not -path './package-lock.json') && for lockfile in $lockfiles; do (cd $(dirname "$lockfile") && npm ci); done
scripts.preinstall: (source $NVM_DIR/nvm.sh && nvm use) || echo 'nvm not found. please use nodejs v20+'
